```{r include = FALSE}
library(DataComputing)
library(ggdendro)
```
<!-- put your content after this line -->

```{r}
Dists <- dist(mtcars)
Dendrogram <- hclust(Dists)
ddata <- dendro_data(Dendrogram)
ggdendrogram(Dendrogram, rotate=TRUE) + geom_text(data = ddata$labels, aes(x = x, y= y, label= label), vjust = 0)
```

```{r}
NCI60narrow <- DataComputing ::NCI60 %>% 
  gather(key=cellline, value = expression, - Probe)
NCI60narrowmean <- NCI60narrow %>% group_by(cellline, Probe) %>% summarise(expression=mean(expression)) %>% ungroup()
NCI60narrow2 <- NCI60narrow %>% group_by(Probe) %>% summarise(spread= sd(expression)) 
NCI60spread4 <- NCI60narrowmean%>% group_by(Probe) %>% filter(sd(expression) >= 4)
```

```{r}
NCI60spread <- NCI60spread4 %>% spread(key=Probe, value=expression)
row.names(NCI60spread) <- NCI60spread$cellline
Distances <- dist(NCI60spread %>% select(-cellline))
Dendrogram2 <- hclust(Distances)
ddata <- dendro_data(Dendrogram2)
ggdendrogram(Dendrogram2, rotate=TRUE)
```
